title.narrative: U.S. Department of Defense, Institutional Capacity Building Programs: Defense Institution Reform Initiative

description.narrative: Ethiopia - Human Resource Management. Explore ENDF recruiting efforts and discuss ways and means to improve ENDF recruiting by: Presenting a model of military recruiting for ENDF consideration; Facilitating ENDF HRM leader discussions on ways to improve ENDF recruiting; Enabling an ENDF RDC HRM leadership back-brief to the Director RDC concerning workshop activities and possible ISG follow-on engagements. Focus on marketing the military to Ethiopian youth to influence media towards youth and image building for the ENDF by: Providing insights on other countries approach to marketing as part of recruiting; Facilitating a series of exercises designed to capture ENDF HRM leaders thoughts on ENDF values and aspirational goals that could enhance ENDF recruiting...
